definition: incantation/magic spell/curse/malediction/to revile/to put a curse on sb

sentences.english: While all the world were chiding.
Like a fluttering sparrow or a darting swallow, an undeserved curse does not come to rest.
sentences.chinese: 麻雀往來，燕子翻飛，這樣，無故的咒詛也必不臨到。

sentences.english: He endured the curse so you could enjoy the blessing.
sentences.chinese: 耶穌爲你承擔了罪的咒詛，使你享受神賜的福份。

sentences.english: There are those who curse their fathers and do not bless their mothers;
sentences.chinese: 有一宗人，咒詛父親，不給母親祝福。

sentences.english: But this people who knoweth not the law are cursed.
sentences.chinese: 但這些不明白律法的百姓，是被咒詛的。

sentences.english: 49No! But this mob that knows nothing of the law--there is a curse on them.
sentences.chinese: 但這些不明白律法的百姓是被咒詛的。

sentences.english: Yes, I have already cursed them, because you have not set your heart to honor me.
sentences.chinese: 因你們不把誡命放在心上，我已經咒詛你們了。

sentences.english: Habits are a blessing, and a curse.
sentences.chinese: 習慣既是一種祝福也是一種咒詛。

sentences.english: It will remain in his house and destroy it, both its timbers and its stones.
sentences.chinese: 咒詛必留在他家中，將房屋和木石盡都毀滅。

sentences.english: Give them sorrow of heart, thy curse unto them.
sentences.chinese: 你要使他們心裏剛硬，使你的咒詛臨到他們。

sentences.english: Having more privacy is another, but that is both a blessing and a curse.
sentences.chinese: 有更多私隱是其中之一，但這是祝福也是咒詛。

sentences.english: How do you feel about Jesus cursing a fig tree?
sentences.chinese: 你對耶穌咒詛無花果樹事件有何感想？

sentences.english: Then will I make this house like Shiloh, and will make this city a curse to all the nations of the earth.
sentences.chinese: 我就必使這殿如示羅，使這城爲地上萬國所咒詛的。

sentences.english: Jn. 7:49 But this crowd which does not know the law is accursed.
sentences.chinese: 約七49但這不明白律法的羣衆，是被咒詛的。

sentences.english: Cursed is the man who withholds justice from the alien, the fatherless or the widow.
sentences.chinese: 向寄居的和孤兒寡婦屈枉正直的，必受咒詛。

sentences.english: Cursed shall be thy basket and thy store.
sentences.chinese: 17你的筐子和你的摶面盆都必受咒詛。

definition: trustworthy/reliable/to believe something to be true
variant of 曉喻|晓喻[xiao3 yu4]
